summary: After a bull dies in an arena, its remains are transported throughout Belgium, France, and Spain, where various characters cross its path.
cast: Julien Lescarret|Ramon Arenillas Llorente|Dominique Vache|Michel Malmoustier|Raphaëlle Molinier|Lucia Sanchez|Chiara Mastroianni|Stéphane Touitou|Armen Godel|Jacques Gamblin|Sandrine Laroche|Rodolfo De Souza|Ángela Molina|Begoña Quirós|Jean-Michel Gouffrant|Clovis Cornillac|Perrine Ferret|Pascal Bongard|Maryline Even|Juliette Noureddine|Lio|Mike Koumi|Féodor Atkine|Irene Dafonte|Pascal N'Zonzi|Esther Gorintin|Bernard Sens|Nicolas Challal|Fabienne Mainguet|Alexandre von Sivers|Jorge Rodriguez|Luc Delhumeau|Alexis Smolen|Antoni Valiante|Michel Cordes|Noham Cochenel|Bernard Gleize|Bénédicte Martin|Michele Dorge|Marie Landfried|Jorge Cabezas
title: Carnages
